briefTitle: Clinical Efficacy and Safety of T1225 Versus Tobramycin 0.3 % Eye Drops in the Treatment of Purulent Bacterial Conjunctivitis of Children.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age ≥ one day of life and ≤ 18 years
* Purulent bacterial conjunctivitis

outcomeMeasures.title: The Primary Efficacy Variable Was Clinical Cure in the Worse Eye on Day 3
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinical cure was defined as a score 0 for bulbar conjunctival injection (evaluated using a 4 point ordinal scale) and a score 0 for conjunctival purulent discharge (evaluated using a 4 point ordinal scale).
